QuestData.Title: Call In a Favor
QuestData.Description:
We will do just as my baroness commands. Let us conjure a helmsman before us... however displeased it might make her.
Activate the beacon and prepare yourself for a fight. The liches regard all Eyes as their enemies, and I am certain your reputation among them does you no favors.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: An expert helmsman for the House of Rituals. Convince her to "cooperate"!
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon Helmsman Caliroux and defeat her.
QuestData.RewardText: My baroness's trust in you is well warranted.
